subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The St. Louis Blues, who missed the playoffs, have acquired goaltender Jaroslav Halak from the Montreal Canadiens for forwards Lars Eller and Ian Schultz, two players who spent most of last season in the minors.
snippet: The St. Louis Blues, who missed the playoffs, have acquired goaltender Jaroslav Halak from the Montreal Canadiens for forwards Lars Eller and Ian Schultz, two players who spent most of last season in the minors.
